Title: bzBond-claris
Description: bzBond-claris is a FileMaker file that includes tools for web code integration, storage, deployment and debugging. It comprises- The `bzBondRelay` script for managing communication between web viewers and FileMaker.- The bzBond Web Project Manager for storing, deploying and debugging web code in FileMaker web viewersFor more information visit https://github.com/beezwax/bzBond
